package.summary: .NET version of the GroupDocs' online document viewer.
package.description:
.NET & ASP.NET Document Viewer Control

This extension is created based on GroupDocs' .NET & ASP.NET document viewer control, which is an online document viewer that can be hosted on-site and allows you to display over 45 different kinds of files directly on your Magento website. The viewer is completely independent, meaning users don't have to install any additional software to view documents online.

Key Features & Benefits

1. GroupDocs Viewer can both rasterize documents and convert them to HTML+CSS+SVG using HTML5 technology. The last option enables you to display documents with native text rendering. This allows users to select and copy text to clipboard right from the embedded documents on your website.

2. When converted to HTML+CSS+SVG, documents are scalable and can be fit to any page or screen size without losing rendering quality - text looks clear and sharp.

3. GroupDocs' document viewer control for .NET & ASP.NET comes with a convenient UI for easy document navigation. Users can scroll documents, turn pages with buttons or jump straight to a specified page. There is also a thumbnail bar for a quick page preview and a search option which allows users to search for text within a document using keywords.

4. Embedded documents can be downloaded and printed out right from a web-browser. However, if you don't want users to copy a document, you can disable the download/print/copy options easily.

5. GroupDocs Viewer doesn't require Flash, Acrobat Reader or any other software installation on the client side. Users can view documents from any device with a web-browser that supports HTML5.

Supported File Formats

With the GroupDocs' document viewer control you can display documents of almost all common business formats: Portable Document Format: PDF Microsoft Word: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM Microsoft Excel: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XML Microsoft PowerPoint: PPT, PPTX Microsoft Visio: VSD, VDX, VSS, VSX, VST, VTX, VSDX, VDW Microsoft Project: MPP, MPT Microsoft Outlook: MSG, EML OpenDocument Formats: ODT, OTT, ODS, ODP Rich Text Format: RTF Plain Text File: TXT Comma-Separated Values: CSV HyperText Markup Language: HTM, HTML, MHT, MHTML XML Paper Specification: XPS AutoCAD Drawing File Format: DXF Image files: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF Electronic publication: EPUB

Installation

Please note: to use the .NET (ASP.NET) version of GroupDocs' document viewer on your Magento website, you need to buy a license first. Alternatively, please contact our sales for a free 30-day evaluation license, so that you can test everything before buying our service. Find installation and usage instructions here.
